name: Cossack Squat
setup: Stand with wide stance, toes pointed forward
Hold dumbbell at chest or dumbbells at sides
steps: Shift weight to one leg and sit back into deep side squat
Keep other leg straight with heel down
Lower as deep as mobility allows
Drive through squatting leg to return to center
safety: This requires good hip and ankle mobility. Start with bodyweight and work within comfortable range.

prescriptionHints.notes: Focus on mobility and depth over weight
